thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: geraldpek
title: Great hotel
text:
good hotel, clean and comfortable. excellent location close to office.Receptionist was really happy person and cheered me up after long flight.Excellent service, helpful staff,.24hr gym and the pool great view. We wished we stayed longer. Thank you.
Room Tip: excellent location See more room tips
